question: Who of the following has been appointed as the Deputy Collector by Andra Pradeh?
explanation: Andhra Pradesh government appointed shuttler Kidambi Srikanth as a Deputy Collector. Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister N Chandrababu Naidu gave the appointment letter to Kidambi Srikanth in the presence of former All-England champion and badminton coach Pullela Gopichand, in Amravati. Kidambi Srikanth has received the Padma Shri award. He became the second youngest sportsperson in India after PV Sindhu to bag the Padma Shri award. After he won the title at the Indonesian Championship in June 2017, he was promised a government job.
